explicit.translation[0].definitions[0].d: expressed in a way that is very clear and direct
explicit.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The contrast could not have been made more explicit.
The kidnappers gave us explicit instructions not to involve the police.
Be explicit when you talk about money with your family.
He made the rules without being explicit about them.
explicit.translation[0].definitions[1].d: language or pictures that are explicit describe or show sex or violence very clearly
explicit.translation[0].definitions[1].e: The film contains some very explicit love scenes.
